ROLES.TITLE: Roles
ROLES.DESCRIPTION: Effortlessly control your roles with the ability to edit, delete, or create new roles. Streamline your role management process by customizing permissions and user access to meet your organizational needs
ROLES.DELETE_WARNING: Do you really want to delete the role "{{roleName}}"?
ROLES.DELETE_ERROR: The delete operation of role "{{roleName}}" has failed!

PERMISSION.TITLE: Permissions
PERMISSION.DESCRIPTION: Effortless Role Management: Empower Users to Seamlessly Add or Remove Permissions from Roles

USER.TITLE: Users
USER.DESCRIPTION: Explore the list of users currently assigned to this role. Here, you have the ability to seamlessly manage the role's user composition. Add new users to this role effortlessly or remove existing users with just a few clicks. Empower your role administration with easy user management functionality.

USERS.TITLE: Users
USERS.DESCRIPTION: Effortlessly manage your users with the ability to edit, delete, or create new users. Customize user profiles and permissions to tailor their access and roles according to your organizational requirements.
